articles.author: Maureen O'Hare
articles.title: Airport introduces time limit on hugs - CNN
articles.description: In travel news this week: the Chinese pets earning “snack money” in cafés, a European capital that’s had enough of “drunk” tourists, and the New Zealand airport that’s curtailing caresses.
